import axios from'axios';const API_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||'http://localhost:1000';export const fetchStudents=async(filter,year,searchTerm)=>{try{const response=await axios.get(`${API_URL}/api/students`,{params:{filter,year:year||'',// Ensure year is properly formatted
searchTerm}});return response.data;}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching students:',error);throw error;}};
